title: How to Make Wheat, Beet and Walnut Salad

steps.headline: Soak bulgur wheat in boiling water until water is absorbed (about half an hour).
Whisk olive oil and lemon juice together and pour over wheat.
Stir in diced beets and walnuts just before serving.
Add salt and pepper to taste.

text: Soak bulgur wheat in boiling water until water is absorbed (about half an hour).  Whisk olive oil and lemon juice together and pour over wheat.  Stir in diced beets and walnuts just before serving.  Add salt and pepper to taste.
